Articles.Content:
You knew it would come to this.

A blonde reality televison personality moves in.

Bimbino Hill

(new, new,new page.)

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-30T15:27:12Z" title="10/30/2021 03:27  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 30, 2021</time> by ColdJ**

Hills. Twin Hills.

Bimbino Twin Hills.

A mob movie is made there.

Bada-bing Bimbino Twin Hills

Mob War.

Bada-bing Bada-boom Bimbino Twin Craters.

That movie was made in Jersey.

Bada-Bing Bada-Boom Fuhgeddaboutit Bimbino Twin Craters

Jokingly saying the boom-bada-bing blah-blah, you unexpectedly summoned the billabong monster.

Red Billabong Hill

Spoiler

![redbillabongfb.jpg](http://www.redbillabongmovie.com/redbillabongfb.jpg)

I freeze the billabong and everything in it.

Blue Billabong Hill.

Fellow Kerbals land.

Green Billabong, Green Bobbabong, and Green Jebbabong hills.

The true star arrives.

Green Valley.

Oh, but it needs to be translated to Spanish.

Valle Verde

[@Gargamel](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/64714-gargamel/) says Meh.

Meh Hill.

Lifting up the hill.

Hills Hoist.

Wet hill.

Hills Moist.

The Moist Hill is sometimes wet, sometimes dry.

Weather Hill

It is not sure what it wants to do.

Whether Hill.

It's in a great doubt, too.

Mount Whether

No choice will ever be right.

No aMount of Whether.

No whether. Only If.

[Château d'If](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ch%C3%A2teau_d%27If)

If it's a chateau?

Whither Chateau d'If

The time has come.

Chateau d'now.

The chateau eau starts chatting.

Chat Eau

Creates it's own scent.

Chat Eau Da Parfume.

Suddenly it appears that it kills mosquitoes.

Chateaudapar Fume

Oh look, a cat.

Chateau de Parfum avec un chat

The cat gets distracted because of a kerbal laser pointer. 

Now the kerbals have taken over the hill
